description.long: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the recharge time of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.
Enhances the Immobilize duration of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Immobilize.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
Enhances the accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
Enhances the range of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}% and immobilize duration by {Boost.Attrib.immobilize.Scale}%.
Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, immobilize duration by {Boost.Attrib.Immobilize.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.
